Netscape 6 Preview Now Released

05 Apr 2000

Netscape has now re-placed the Navigator/Mozilla download back onto its servers for public consumption. Apparently this time this is the offical preview release of the new standards-based browser. You can download the file from http://www.netscape.com/download/.
